ygData.msgSnippet: lol lol..  hehe i ve been posting in the guild mailing list, i just wanted to be on this one too :D    Well, I would love to have ivy in our guild, but she is
ygData.messageBody:
lol lol.. hehe i've been posting in the guild mailing list, i just wanted to
be on this one too :D Well, I would love to have ivy in our guild, but she
is in her spouce's guild for now.. however i really want her to group with
the higher ups if thats ok! I remember that one guy joined the guild just
for the SRo event that one time, but I think he used to be in the guild or
something.. so maybe thats why you made an exception?? :) Well if
there's any more get togethers, would it be ok for ivy to join in the fun?

Thanks for good times!
Lori ~ Melalle and her boneheads
